meanings.sent1: The table was the unsteadiest in the whole house.
meanings.sent2: The unsteadiest bridge swayed in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The unsteadiest chair in the room always made people nervous.
meanings.sent4: Her unsteadiest thoughts were like a ship in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The unsteadiest ground felt like walking on jelly.

meanings.sent1: He was the unsteadiest dancer at the party.
meanings.sent2: The unsteadiest boat rocked dangerously on the waves.
meanings.sent3: The unsteadiest stack of books threatened to topple over.
meanings.sent4: His unsteadiest emotions were like a rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent5: Walking on ice felt like being on the unsteadiest ground.

meanings.definition: Showing unsteadiness or lack of control
meanings.sent1: Her voice was the unsteadiest during the presentation.
meanings.sent2: The unsteadiest hands spilled the paint everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The unsteadiest umbrella flipped inside out in the wind.
meanings.sent4: His unsteadiest performance was like a comedy show.
meanings.sent5: The unsteadiest flame flickered in the dark.
